channel.title: Connection lost
channel.description:
Hi,
If i go online with Silab, it says: connectin error (when i'm loading title screen), and @ Mopar nothing, but if log in it is or C lost (not one time, but continous), or loading please wait (for 10+minutes, it never stops)

item.title: Connection lost
item.dc:creator: @ataaa ataaa
item.description:
@ataaa wrote:

uhm i don’t think so

i’m with my laptop, got normally 3 or 4 from the 5, and at the PC downstairs it works, and how i can be sure it don’t randomly turn on/of?

pleaseeeeee i hope someone got the answer

Read full topic

item.title: Connection lost
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

I believe this has nothing to do with your client or computer. Are you sure your internet connection does NOT randomly turn on and off, on and off continuously?

Read full topic
